title: Mahoutsukai no Yome: Gakuin-hen
original_name: 『魔法使いの嫁 学院篇』コミックス宣伝 PV
sinopse: A short ONA released on the MAGGardeninfo YouTube channel to promote the manga's 11th Volume. Immediately follows the events of the TV show, previewing material from the manga's as-of-yet unadapted 10th Volume with new original animation and voice acting.
